product_name: Partners West Wilderness Ethics: Preserving the Spirit of Wildness - Second Edition
long_description: The second edition of the classic book 'Wilderness Ethics: Preserving the Spirit of Wildness' helps put the many issues surrounding wilderness into focus.
short_description: The second edition of the classic book 'Wilderness Ethics: Preserving the Spirit of Wildness' helps put the many issues surrounding wilderness into focus.
